column5: Just wondering if anyone has had any trouble taking propane tanks into Canada? I would like to take my turkey fryer for our fishing trip but wasn't sure if there were any regulations against it. Thanks in advance.
I've hauled a twenty pounder back and forth for my grill, they've never given it a second look at the border.
This will be my 15th year taking propane- never had a problem, have a great trip!!- 7 days and counting for me!. Bronco
